recipes.title: Daal
recipes.method: First wash the daal a couple of times and fill it up with water and cook in a rice cooker for about 20 mins/ 6-7 whistles...

recipes.title: Mango slushie
recipes.method: first slice the mangoes up roughly and blend them finely. Then put the ice cubes in the blender and blend for a couple of seconds. Add sugar and blend again..
